Humanity exist on a warm blue planet tucked in the safest corner of the universe. Surrounded by a force field you call an atmosphere. An atmosphere that keeps in the things you need to survive, and keeps out the things that could harm you. Often burning them up in the atmosphere.

A planet with a constant source of warmth and energy from the Sun. In a solar system with perfectly aligned orbits, and gravitational forces that deflect large objects away from Earth, into outer space. Or into the sun. I got yo Good News right here..‚úùüòÇ
